MarechaiRoles.Name: UberAdmin
MarechaiRoles.Description: Can administer everything, cannot be deleted, only one must exist.

MarechaiRoles.Name: Writer
MarechaiRoles.Description: Can write new textual data about an artifact.

MarechaiRoles.Name: SuperTranslator
MarechaiRoles.Description: Can translate textual data and proofread translations.

MarechaiRoles.Name: Collaborator
MarechaiRoles.Description: Can propose changes or additions to artifacts.

MarechaiRoles.Name: Curator
MarechaiRoles.Description: Can make changes or additions to artifacts and curate the ones done by a collaborator.

MarechaiRoles.Name: PhysicalCurator
MarechaiRoles.Description: Same as curator but in addition can control a physical inventory.

MarechaiRoles.Name: Technician
MarechaiRoles.Description: Can modify repairs of artifacts in the inventory.

MarechaiRoles.Name: SuperTechnician
MarechaiRoles.Description: Can add, modify and close repairs and approve changes made by a technician of artifacts in the inventory.

MarechaiRoles.Name: Administrator
MarechaiRoles.Description: Can administer certain parts of the website.
